bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Pathological Condition identical with shi fu 食復 , recurrence because of food. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 10: 治食 勞方，麺二升煮取汁服之 , “Recipe for curing food exhaustion : Boil two sheng of flour in water. Consume the liquid”.

② Etiological Agent. of immoderate eating and drinking. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 49: 治食癥癖氣，食勞， 宿食不消，痰逆，京三棱丸方 , “To cure food-induced qi concretion-illness and aggregation-illness, food exhaustion with food that remains in the body overnight without being digested, and phlegm counterflow, [use] the recipe for pills with jing san leng ”.
